reviewText: pretty good movie, I didn't think about turning it off before it was over. that's saying quiet a bit for this type of movie. re-watchable probably after several months.
Great movie loved all of it

This is an excellent film about love and family. Townsend is great. His performance is understated but effective. Richardson is beautiful, strong and sexy. She is always great. I loved this film about educated, successful African Americans. This is a funny, romantic story. It's about integrity and family. The adult themes of family, love and sex are handled realistically and tastefully. Highly recommended for fans of romantic comedies featuring two African American leads. The music and direction are on point. Townsend always presents quality films. He is an excellent writer, actor and director. I hope to see more films from him. Keep up the good work RT.
Uplifting film with a great message.  This film  also  involved  the youth in Miami on the process of filmmaking.
